alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; Gates of the Mountains; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 5:24PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Lewis and Clark, northwestern Meagher and southwestern Cascade Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 523 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles east of Wolf Creek, or 24 miles south of Cascade, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, half inch hail, and brief heavy rain showers. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cascade County below 5000ft; Gates of the Mountains; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains
